pageContext.description:
A public house with character and a view south towards the river, a victim of modernisations, pulled down to make way for luxury flats.

Original watercolour, image size 9" x 5.75".

(Original Watercolour SOLD)

The signed, embossed limited edition print, mounted to fit frame size 14"x 11"

Price £45

pageContext.metaDescription: Watercolour painting of The Antelope Inn, Hereford. By Herefordshire artist David J. Fry
